item.title: 球X坑》如何成为一款热门视频游戏
item.description: 这款独立游戏自 10 月 15 日发布以来已售出 75 万份。【原文：The indie title has sold 750,000 copies since its release on Oct. 15.】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司顶级油田将于 12 月启动下一个平台
item.description: 巴西国家石油公司今年将继续扩大世界最大油田的产量，同时在推进深水项目时避免成本上涨。【原文：Petrobras will continue expanding production at the world’s biggest oil field this year while avoiding cost inflation as it advances deep-water projects.】

item.title: 荷兰首相肖夫表示中国将恢复 Nexperia 芯片出口
item.description: 荷兰首相迪克-肖夫（Dick Schoof）表示，中国已同意恢复从该国工厂交付 Nexperia 芯片，这标志着一场有可能中断全球汽车生产的冲突有了突破性进展。【原文：Dutch Prime Minister Dick Schoof said China has agreed to resume deliveries of Nexperia chips from plants in the country, signaling a potential breakthrough in a clash that risked disrupting global auto production.】

item.title: 特朗普媒体股跌势加剧，大选上涨势头被抵消，损失不断增加
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的第二个任期还不到一年，其社交媒体公司的销售额停滞不前，盈利能力依然遥遥无期，大选后的喜悦已经从公司股价中蒸发殆尽。【原文：Less than one year into Donald Trump’s second term and the post-election ebullience has evaporated from shares of his social media company as sales stagnate and profitability remains elusive.】

item.title: 索尔上涨 11% 后秘鲁央行再次购买美元
item.description: 在美元反弹将其推高至 2020 年以来的新高后，秘鲁央行五年来首次进入货币市场，买入美元。【原文：Peru’s central bank has stepped into the currency market, buying dollars for the first time in five years after a rally in the sol pushed it to levels not seen since 2020.】

item.title: 比尔-盖茨投入 14 亿美元帮助农民适应极端气候
item.description: 亿万富翁、慈善家比尔-盖茨正在投入资金，帮助小规模农户适应气候变化，解决粮食生产资金缺口问题。【原文：Billionaire philanthropist Bill Gates is pouring money into helping small-scale farmers adapt to climate change and address a gap in funding for food production.】

item.title: 特朗普之子支持 ASPI 的铀部门 QLE 出售可转换债券
item.description: ASP Isotopes 公司的铀浓缩部门正在发行可转换票据，这项交易得到了包括埃里克-特朗普和小唐纳德-特朗普在内的投资者的支持。【原文：ASP Isotopes Inc.’s uranium-enriching arm is offering convertible notes in a deal that has drawn the backing of investors including Eric Trump and Donald Trump Jr.】

item.title: 美国联邦住房管理局（FHFA）的普尔特称房利美和房地美有意参股科技公司
item.description: 联邦住房金融局局长比尔-普尔特（Bill Pulte）表示，房利美（Fannie Mae）和房地美（Freddie Mac）正在研究如何参股科技公司。【原文：Bill Pulte, the director of the Federal Housing Finance Agency, said that Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac are looking at ways to take equity stakes in technology companies.】

item.title: 博茨瓦纳和安哥拉在争夺戴比尔斯股份的竞争中 "完全一致
item.description: 博茨瓦纳和安哥拉淡化了争夺戴比尔斯的前景，此前两国都表示将寻求获得这家标志性钻石开采商的多数股权。【原文：Botswana and Angola played down the prospect of a fight over De Beers, after both previously said they would seek a majority equity share in the iconic diamond miner.】

item.title: 贡渥集团在遭到美国斥责数小时后从银行获得 24 亿美元资金
item.description: 在美国财政部将贡渥集团称为 "克里姆林宫的傀儡 "并阻止其收购卢克石油公司（Lukoil PJSC）的国际资产后不到一天，一家国际银行银团同意向贡渥集团提供 24 亿美元的信贷。【原文：A syndicate of international banks agreed to provide commodity trader Gunvor Group with $2.4 billion in credit, with the announcement coming less than a day after the US Treasury called the company “the Kremlin’s puppet” and blocked its pursuit of Lukoil PJSC’s international assets.】

item.title: 人工智能贸易疲软，微软面临 2011 年以来最长跌势
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）有望创下十多年来最长的连续日跌幅，原因是对人工智能交易的日益谨慎继续给大型科技股带来压力。【原文：Microsoft Corp. is on track for its longest streak of daily losses in more than a decade as growing caution about the artificial intelligence trade continues to pressure big tech stocks.】

item.title: 石油交易商在没有定位数据的情况下在停摆中漂泊
item.description: Rick Bandazian 从事石油交易，撰写关于他所谓的 "不对称交易机会 "的时事通讯，并在 YouTube 上主持一档节目，在由消防队改建的办公室里传授在市场上赚钱的秘诀。【原文：Rick Bandazian trades oil, writes a newsletter on what he calls “asymmetric trade opportunities” and hosts a YouTube show with tips on making money in the market, doled out from his office in a converted fire house.】

item.title: 乌克兰将从波兰进口更多来自美国液化天然气的天然气
item.description: 在俄罗斯的袭击摧毁了乌克兰近 60% 的国内天然气生产之后，乌克兰将增加从波兰购买天然气，而这些天然气将来自美国液化天然气的进口。【原文：Ukraine will increase its gas purchases from Poland, sourced from imports of US liquefied natural gas, after Russian attacks wiped out almost 60% of its domestic production.】

item.title: NextEra 能源公司即将达成收购 ECP 支持的 Symmetry 公司的交易
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，NextEra Energy 公司正在就以约 8 亿美元的价格收购控股公司 Symmetry Energy Solutions 进行深入谈判。【原文：NextEra Energy Inc. is in advanced talks to acquire closely held Symmetry Energy Solutions for about $800 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 瑞银集团加入新加坡政府投资公司（GIC）支持的孟买大厦明星租户行列
item.description: 据知情人士透露，瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）将于明年初在新加坡政府投资公司（GIC Pte）支持的孟买摩天大楼中租用新的办公空间，成为众多知名租户中的一员。【原文：UBS Group AG is taking up new office space in a Mumbai skyscraper backed by GIC Pte early next year, people familiar said, joining a list of high-profile tenants.】

item.title: 贝莱德的里德尔认为就业市场疲软，希望美联储将利率维持在 3% 的水平
item.description: 贝莱德公司高管里克-里德（Rick Rieder）是美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的继任者之一，他表示，劳动力市场正在疲软，利率应降至3%。【原文：BlackRock Inc. executive Rick Rieder, who is among those being considered to succeed Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, said the labor market is softening and interest rates should be lowered to 3%.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德与令贷款人警惕的公司共建财富基金
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）不费吹灰之力，就为富豪们培育了一支收购基金。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management didn’t have to look far to seed a buyout fund for wealthy individuals.】

item.title: KKR 股价因亚洲基金疲软退费打击而下跌
item.description: KKR & Co.股价下跌，此前该公司透露，由于业绩不佳，计划向其在亚洲的第二只私募股权基金的投资者退还 3.5 亿美元。【原文：KKR & Co. shares dropped after the company revealed plans to refund $350 million to investors in its second private equity fund in Asia due to underperformance.】

item.title: 聊天机器人妄想症：人工智能是否助长了新的心理健康危机？
item.description:
一些用户在与 ChatGPT 和其他机器人进行马拉松式的会话过程中与现实失去了联系。【原文：

Some users are losing touch with reality during marathon sessions with ChatGPT and other bots.

】

item.title: 美国消费者信心降至逾三年低点
item.description: 由于政府关门影响了经济前景，高物价又使人们对个人财务状况的看法变差，美国消费者情绪跌至三年多来的最低点。【原文：US consumer sentiment fell to a more than three-year low as the government shutdown weighed on the economic outlook and high prices soured views about personal finances.】

item.title: 欧洲央行埃尔德森称增长下行风险有所缓解
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员弗兰克-埃尔德森（Frank Elderson）表示，该地区经济面临的一些危险已有所缓解，但前景仍难以预测。【原文：European Central Bank Executive Board member Frank Elderson said some of the dangers facing the region’s economy have eased, though the outlook remains unpredictable.】

item.title: 人工智能反弹乏力，美股将结束周线连胜
item.description: 由于投资者继续担心科技行业估值过高，周五美国股市延续跌势，使基准股指有望中断连续一周的涨势。【原文：US stocks extended declines on Friday, putting benchmarks on track to snap a string of weekly gains as investors continued to fret about stretched valuations in the tech sector.】

item.title: 美国出资 4.65 亿美元支持 Serra Verde 的巴西稀土项目
item.description: 巴西稀土生产商 Serra Verde 从美国国际开发金融公司获得了多达 4.65 亿美元的资金，因为西方国家正寻求减少稀土这种关键矿产对中国的依赖。【原文：Brazilian rare earths producer Serra Verde secured as much as $465 million in funding from the US International Development Finance Corporation as Western nations seek to reduce reliance on China for the key minerals.】

item.title: 中国将于本月晚些时候出售 40 亿欧元主权债券
item.description: 中国已宣布计划在本月晚些时候出售多达 40 亿欧元（46 亿美元）的欧元国债，本周早些时候的 40 亿美元债务销售墨迹未干。【原文：China has unveiled plans to sell up to €4 billion ($4.6 billion) of euro-denominated government bonds later this month, with the ink barely dry on a $4 billion debt sale earlier this week.】

item.title: 高盛集团的帕斯夸里洛说，风险平衡有利于股票牛市
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Traders are pondering a moment of weakness embedded in a multi-month rip higher for stocks, yet the market on balance looks poised for further gains, said Goldman Sachs Group Inc.’s Tony Pasquariello.】

item.title: 苹果音乐面临失去下一代听众的风险
item.description:
该服务缺乏免费层级可能会使其在音乐消费者（尤其是新兴市场的音乐消费者）心目中的前景黯淡

。【原文：

The service’s lack of a free tier might be dimming its prospects with music consumers, particularly in emerging markets

】

item.title: 土耳其在 "高利贷 "调查中拘留私人银行董事长
item.description: 土耳其一家私人银行的董事长被当局指控 "放高利贷 "和洗钱而遭到拘留。【原文：The chairman of a private Turkish bank was detained after authorities accused him of “loan sharking” and money laundering.】

item.title: 纳格尔说：如果局势恶化，欧洲应酝酿对华行动
item.description: 德国联邦银行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，如果与中国的贸易关系继续恶化，欧洲应考虑对中国采取措施。【原文：Europe should consider measures against China if trade ties with the Asian nation continue to deteriorate, according to Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel.】

item.title: 世界银行称飓风过后牙买加巨灾债券有望获得全额赔付
item.description: 据世界银行称，在飓风梅利莎引发全面触发事件后，牙买加巨灾债券的投资者现在面临着 100% 的赔付。【原文：Investors in Jamaica’s catastrophe bond now face a 100% payout after Hurricane Melissa set off a full trigger event, according to the World Bank.】

item.title: 加拿大就业人数增加 6.66 万人，失业率降至 6.9
item.description: 加拿大经济在 10 月份增加了 6.66 万个就业岗位，连续第二个月实现就业岗位的意外增长，否则关税将减缓经济活动。【原文：The Canadian economy added 66,600 jobs in October, marking a second consecutive month of surprise employment gains as tariffs otherwise slow down economic activity.】
